products.description: Luna blackouttaupe beige perfect fit pleated blind. The "luna blackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.
